data.name: Mugen Souls - Mega Costume Bundle 2
data.detailed_description:
Mega Costume Bundle 2 contains the following items:

Hyperdimension Neptunia Set
Purple Frames, Brain Controller, Nepgear Sailor Dress, Pink Striped Band, Nepgear Boots. The following avatar usage parts have been added; Nepgear Face, Nepgear Style.
*These will be added to your inventory upon exiting and re-entering G-Castle.

Hyperdimension Goddess Unit Set
Toast, Twin Brain Controller, Neptune Hoodie Dress, Blue Striped Hair Band, Neptune Shoes. The following avatar usage parts have been added; Neptune Face, Neptune Style.
*These will be added to your inventory upon exiting and re-entering G-Castle.

Agarest Protagonist Set
The Oathsworn, Mind's Eye Mask, Justice Horns, Golden Leonhardt Jacket, Golden Leonhardt Pants, Golden Leonhardt Boots. The following avatar usage parts have been added; Leonhardt Face, Leonhardt Style.
*These will be added to your inventory upon exiting and re-entering G-Castle.

Spectral Souls Set
Heaven's Gate, Flaming Crest, Bunny Ears Hair Band, Flaming Adornment, Flaming Skirt, Flaming Boots. The following avatar usage parts have been added; Hiro Face, Hiro Style.
*These will be added to your inventory upon exiting and re-entering G-Castle.

Lonely Goddess Set
Black Eye Patch, Black Cat Ears, Noire's Clear Dress, Noire's Clear Garter, Noire's Clear Boots. The following avatar usage parts have been added; Noire Face, Noire Style.
*These will be added to your inventory upon exiting and re-entering G-Castle.

Gamer Goddess Set
Dogoo Candy, White Cat Ears, Vert's Princess Dress, Vert's Princess Guard, Vert's Princess Boots. The following avatar usage parts have been added; Vert Face, Vert Style.
*These will be added to your inventory upon exiting and re-entering G-Castle.

Agarest Bride Set
Chocolate Banana, Wedding Headdress, Fyuria's Top Armor, Fyuria's Cross Belt, Fyuria's Metal Boots. The following avatar usage parts have been added; Fyuria Face, Fyuria Style.
*These will be added to your inventory upon exiting and re-entering G-Castle.

data.short_description: Mega Costume Bundle 2 contains the following items: Hyperdimension Neptunia Set, Hyperdimension Goddess Unit Set, Agarest Protagonist Set, Spectral Souls Set, Lonely Goddess Set, Gamer Goddess Set, Agarest Bride Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 512Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 1GB RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
